target_markets.market_description: SMB (Small-Medium Business) founders with SaaS tools or products with one killer feature
target_markets.market_size_indicators: inefficient market with creators who don't know their real value

pain_points: don't know how to price themselves
lack understanding of their real worth
target_markets.market_size_indicators: hundreds of creators making videos in specific niches like Google Ads

problems_validated.problem: Traditional creator marketing through agencies is expensive and creators know their real value
problems_validated.severity: High - prevents access to cost-effective marketing
problems_validated.market_gap: Direct outreach to smaller creators who underprice themselves creates marketing arbitrage

products_tools.name: Everbee
products_tools.metrics: zero to 6 million ARR in 18 months, entirely bootstrapped

products_tools.name: Fiverr email scraping service
products_tools.use_case: Manual email scraping for YouTube creators

business_strategies.strategy: YouTube creators plus affiliate marketing for customer acquisition
business_strategies.implementation: Reach out to creators, pay for sponsored videos, provide affiliate commissions based on traffic driven
business_strategies.expected_results: Product demos in disguise, trackable ROI, rapid market penetration
business_strategies.case_study: Everbee: zero to 6 million ARR in 18 months using only this strategy

business_strategies.implementation: Contact 100 creators, expect 50 responses, find 10 who underprice themselves, put winners on retainer
business_strategies.case_study: Friend took company from zero to 6 million ARR in 18 months

problems_solutions.problem: Getting contact emails for YouTube creators at scale
problems_solutions.solution: Use YouTube's built-in email feature, API scraping, or Fiverr services
steps: Use API or manual methods to scale
problems_solutions.time_estimate: 50 emails per week manually, 8 emails per 24-hour session limit

problems_solutions.problem: YouTube limits email access to 8 per session
problems_solutions.solution: Use API services with CAPTCHA solving or hire manual scrapers
steps: Subscribe to Rapid API YouTube scraper

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Spending money on short-form content clipping agencies instead of creator partnerships
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Untrackable ROI, less effective than long-form creator content
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Focus budget on YouTube creator partnerships with affiliate tracking
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Spending $1,000 on clipping short form vs investing in trackable creator partnerships

growth_tactics.results_expected: Trackable ROI, product demos in disguise, rapid market penetration

metrics_kpis.benchmark: 50% response rate from 100 contacts, 10 will underprice themselves significantly
metrics_kpis.tracking_method: Email response tracking and pricing analysis
metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: Focus on creators with 10,000 to 50,000 subscribers who don't know their value

metrics_kpis.benchmark: Direct dollar amount attribution per creator
metrics_kpis.tracking_method: Affiliate links in YouTube video descriptions
metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: Use longer form videos (10+ minutes) for better tracking vs short-form content

trends_signals.trend: Shift from short-form to long-form creator marketing for B2B
trends_signals.opportunity: Better ROI tracking and more effective product demonstrations through longer YouTube videos
Smaller creators (10K-50K subs) undervalue themselves creating cost-effective marketing opportunities

actionable_quotes.quote: YouTube creators plus affiliate marketing is one of the best ways to go about getting your first customers
actionable_quotes.context: Discussing customer acquisition for SMB SaaS products
actionable_quotes.actionability: Implement creator partnership program for customer acquisition

actionable_quotes.quote: It's basically a product demo that's in disguise
actionable_quotes.context: Explaining why creator videos work for product marketing
actionable_quotes.actionability: Frame creator partnerships as product demonstrations rather than traditional ads

actionable_quotes.quote: Imagine you have 100 creators that are posting a video about you monthly, about your product. What happens if you do that within a category? You're going to be everywhere overnight
actionable_quotes.context: Explaining the scale potential of creator marketing
actionable_quotes.actionability: Scale creator partnerships to achieve market dominance in your category
